label_receive_use_qr: Use this QR code to receive monero

button_private_login_key: I’VE WRITTEN DOWN MY SEED, LOG ME IN
qr_code_text: QR code helps you rapidly receive payments. You don't need to e-mail or type-out a Monero address if someone is sending you funds. They may simply scan your QR code using a Monero application that supports this system.
description_what_xmrwallet_text: Monero is an open-source cryptocurrency created in April 2014 that focuses on privacy and decentralization. XMRWallet provides an open-source web environment for your monero wallet. Nathalie Roy created XMRWallet to facilitate the usage of monero without having to download or compile any software. XMRWallet will always be completely free to use and rely solely on donations.
description_what_hosted_3: Completely free, including importing previous transactions
description_risk_xmrwallet_text: XMRWallet is a web-based interface. It helps you use Monero without running a full Monero node. Using XMRWallet for large amounts you may have considerable risk. We recommend you treat XMRWallet like you will treat your actual wallet. Try to not store large amounts in it. If you would like to use Monero for long-term storage, we suggest creating an account, storing your private key in a safe place and only use it once.
description_must_xmrwallet_text: Above this information you will find your "Seed" of twenty five words. You must keep it secure and private. Remember that it is very important for you. This is the only way for you to login to your Monero account. We cannot store your "Seed" on the server and if you lost it we will not have opportunity to recover it. You cannot change your "Seed". If it is stolen you must move your funds to a new account with a new "Seed". The best way to backup your "Seed" is by writing it down on a piece of paper, laminating it and storing it in a secure place.
landing_header_subitle: Send and receive Monero instantly using XMRWallet.com
landing_description_security_text: Monero is a secure digital cash which is operated by a user's network. Monero is also a decentralized cryptocurrency. All transactions are  confirmed by distributed consensus and all transactions then recorded to the blockchain immutably. You need not to trust any third-parties to keep your Monero safe.
landing_description_nobody_text: Monero obfuscates all receiving and sending address and all transacted amounts as well, no one can link the Monero blockchain to a particular user or make a real-world identity match.
landing_description_privacy_text: To obfuscate the destinations origins and amounts of all transactions Monero uses stealth address, ring confidential transactions and ring signature. All the benefits of a decentralized cryptocurrency are provided by Monero with no typical privacy concessions.
landing_description_changeable_text: Monero is changeable because it is private by default. Vendors cant blacklist Monero or exchange it due to the association with previous transactions.
policy_h4_1_1: If you use our websites, mobile applications of our company, or when you interact with our company in any other way, you should learn how we collect information, use it and disclose it.

policy_h4_2_1: First of all is, the information you give us directly. Such as, the date when you create an account, about your participation in any other interactive actions of our services, to fill this or that form; what transactions did you complete with the help of XMRwallet, if you asked about customer support if you communicated with us lately. The information we ask for includes your e-mail address, m-address, open allies aliases, password, mobile phone number, mobile PIN code and any other you would like to give us. Automatically is collected information about your use of the service, the type of browser you use, access times, pages viewed, your IP address and those pages which you looked through before connecting with us.
policy_h4_2_2: Information about device: about the mobile device you use when connecting with our mobile application, including hardware telephones, operating system and version, unique device identifiers and mobile network information.
policy_h4_2_3: Sometimes we send small data files stored on your hard drive or in device memory. They are called cookies. If helps us to improve our services and give you more experience.
policy_h4_2_4: So we can control what services are popular and count contacts and visits if you disable cookies, you will break the session function which is required by the hosted account service of XMRwallet.

terms_h4_4_1: We will describe our services in details below our services provides in brow they software and it generates and stores a XMRwallet account address and a private key, they make easier requests to the XMRwallet network without requiring install the associated XMRwallet client software, and requiring you to personally download.
terms_h4_4_2: Your account address and your personal private key. If you create an account, our services provide you a pair of cryptographic private and public keys which you can use while sending and receiving through the XMRwallet network. This view key of your account is stored by the service which enables it to determine any transactions concerning to you account. The services do not know or store your private key. What means that it is cryptographically impossible for our company to spend founds on your behalf. The combined public key generated by our services is your XMRwallet account address and it is used to create transaction and may be shared with XMRwallet network and with others to complete XMRwallet transaction and to send XMRwallet from that account address. You have your personal responsibility for security of your private key and your seed. it is uniquely matches the account address and must be used in connection with the account address to make transactions to send XMRwallet from that account address. Be attentive! You must remember that any one that has access to your seed or private key pair will be able to spend or to transfer the XMRwallet.
terms_h4_4_3: You cannot retrieve your seed our company does not receive on stare your account seed nor the unencrypted private spend key. We cannot help you to retrieve your account seed. Our services provide you with tools to reveal your own seed when it logged in, wonder to facilitate backups by you, but we cannot generate a new seed for your account. You only you responsible and must remember your account seed. If you have forgotten any account addresses and seed or private view or spend key pairs maintained in your account, any XMRwallet you have associated with these account addresses will become inaccessible if you do not remember your account login key.
terms_h4_4_4: Requests for transactions all proposed XMRwallet transactions are confirmed and recorded in the XMRwallet public ledger through verification network which is distributed consensus XMRwallet network. It is not our ownership. We do not control it. Our services only help you to submit your XMRwallet transaction request for conformation to the verification network. These networks are operated by decentralized network as an independent third panther.
terms_h4_4_5: We do not control the XMRwallet network and verification network and we cannot guarantee that every transaction request you make through the services will be confirmed through verification network. Some of them will not be completed or even maybe delayed by verification network. If you complete a transaction request through the services you authorize our company to submit your request about transaction to the network according with the instructions you provide through the services.
terms_h4_4_6: Do not store or transmit XMRwallet. XMRwallet exists only by virtue of the ownership records maintained in the XMRwallet network. Our services do not store, send or receive XMRwallet. Any transfer occurs within the decentralized XMRwallet network but not within the services.
terms_h4_4_7: Our relationship with you means that our company is an independent contractor for all operations, but not your agent or trustee.
terms_h4_4_8: Be accurate with information you must guarantee that all information you provide for our services is complete and accurate. Company is not responsible for your errors or omissions while you use our XMRwallet services. If you mistype an account address or provide incorrect information in any transaction request the XMRwallet will be sent to whatever account address or information you give. be careful before completing any transaction request through the send.
terms_h4_4_9: You cannot correct your mistakes to cancelation or modification your message. If you have send your transaction on request to the XMRwallet verification network through the services, your request will be automatically completed or rejected and you will not be able to cancel or modify your transaction request. We have no control over the XMRwallet verification network and we cannot correct or modification your request. All request are irreversible.
terms_h4_4_10: Taxes. You are responsible for determining what taxes are applied to the transactions which you complete through the services. You must report and remit the correct tax to the appropriate tax authority. Our company cannot determinate whether taxes apply to your XMRwallet transactions. We cannot collect, with hold, remit or collect any taxes asking from XMRwallet transactions.
terms_h4_5_1: Though the access to the account is free, our company can change fees for some additional services. Company an charge a fee for practically every transaction. the sum of fees will be displayed while you use this or that service.
terms_h4_5_3: XMRwallet network software is installed in the XMRwallet verification network. The computers of our customers use it. So they are called "miners" and voluntary participate in confirmation process of verification network. XMRwallet mining overview. XMRwallet network software is installed in the XMRwallet verification network and you computers are operated by it. The persons who operate such computers are called "mines", they voluntary participate in the verification network confirmation process XMRwallet "mines" make a list of further XMRwallet transactions, called "blocks" as reward which are generated automatically through the XMRwallet network any fees which are voluntary included into block by the persons who initiated the proposed transactions(miners fees) if miners verify XMRwallet transactions on a voluatary basis if is necessary to add miners fees to have an opportunity to provide an incentive to the miners to add a suggested transaction to the next block for confirmation on through the verification network.
terms_h4_5_5: Miners fees are not allowed to modify by our services at this stage. They are calculated on the base of the expected minimum fee for any transaction, which is calculated on per-kilobyte size of the physical data size of the transaction, which is not related to the amount of XMRwallet which will be transferred. You must know and agree with the fact that company does not receive any miners fees though it provides the services. We are not responsible for the speed with what your transactions may be verified by miners.
